## Checklist

- [ ] Workflow is in `community-submissions/{workflow-name}/WORKFLOW.md`
- [ ] Has required frontmatter (`name`, `emoji`, `description`, `author`)
- [ ] Uses `{{SECRET:NAME}}` format for any required credentials
- [ ] Tested and works with my agent
- [ ] No hardcoded personal data (API keys, usernames, paths)
